channel.title: Need a way to anti ddos!
channel.description: I need an anti-ddos thing. I seem to be a target on my server, so I got ddosed a few times... How do I make it so they can't ddos?

item.title: Need a way to anti ddos!
item.dc:creator: @Kizbits2000 Kizbits2000
item.description:
@Kizbits2000 wrote:

They are hard to stop as the bot itslef uses other peoples IP’s as its own so that can be stoped unless you do 1 ip per login, But then it can use proxys, and as for name they don’t just have to use the name SYIPKER they can use anything they like, the last one that spammed my server was called adobe1, adobe2 ect…

Read full topic
item.source: Need a way to anti ddos!

item.title: Need a way to anti ddos!
item.dc:creator: @Kizbits2000 Kizbits2000
item.description:
@Kizbits2000 wrote:

I know what he’s talking about, And yeaa SYI attacks are virtually impossible to stop

Read full topic
item.source: Need a way to anti ddos!

item.title: Need a way to anti ddos!
item.dc:creator: @Free Free
item.description:
@Free wrote:

[quote=“Kizbits2000, post:3, topic:228942”]Lol mate belive me no one has ddos’ed you otherwise you would know about it, DDOS would cause your network to shutdown and not recover for a few days, The most people may have done is mass flooded your server which is similar but not as bad.
Urm… but yer to help gainstt mass flooding just do what he said above.
But if someone was to ddos you it wouldn’t be just 1 IP it would be several IP’s if not hundreds all attacking you at once.

=)[/quote]

He is talking about SYI attacks. The one connection per IP would work for some SYI’s but some other versions of SYI can read IP’s already connected to the server and mask itself with those IP’s making the IP ban useless and maybe pissing off innocent people.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a way to anti ddos!

Urm… but yer to help gainstt mass flooding just do what he said above.
But if someone was to ddos you it wouldn’t be just 1 IP it would be several IP’s if not hundreds all attacking you at once.

=)
